description: [Village Telco](http://villagetelco.org) is a an easy-to-use, scalable, standards-based, wireless, local, DIY, telephone company toolkit.  Their mission is to making voice and data communication affordable and accessible to anyone.
name: Village Telco

ohloh.name: Village Telco
ohloh.description: This is an initiative to assemble/develop the cheapest, easiest to setup, easiest to manage, scalable, Open Source, standards-based, wireless local do-it-yourself telephone company toolkit in the world.
